extension.summary: Retrospect (previously XBMC Online TV) is a plugin that allows the playback of a lot of TV shows that are available (legally) via the broadcasters websites.
extension.description: Retrospect uses the official websites of a lot of different broadcasting companies (mainly Dutch, Belgian, British and Swedish) to make their re-run episodes available on the Kodi platform. More information can be found at www.rieter.net.[CR][CR]Retrospect reports back usage statistics to our servers. This option can be disabled from the add-on settings.
extension.disclaimer: Retrospect is provided as is. We do not take any responsibility for possible (but highly unlikely) damage cause to your system. Nor do we take responsibility for the content that can be watched via this add-on.

extension.summary: Resolve common live video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi + find links embeded in sites.
Livestreamer extracts streams from various services
extension.description: Livestreamer is a command-line utility that pipes video streams from various services into a video player, such as VLC. The main purpose of Livestreamer is to allow the user to avoid buggy and CPU heavy flash plugins but still be able to enjoy various streamed content. There is also an API available for developers who want access to the video stream data.
extension.license: Simplified BSD

extension.summary: Thumbnails Cleaner allows you to clean the thumbnails folder of your Kodi
Thumbnails Cleaner consente di pulire la cartella thumbnails del tuo Kodi
extension.description: Thumbnails Cleaner works for exclusion. The script read the databases and excludes the images found. Once completed, the images will be moved to the destination folder you choose. It is also possible to completely delete the images without moving them. In case of simulation, the images will be copied.

Thumbnails Cleaner lavora per esclusione. Lo script legge i database ed esclude le immagini trovate. Una volta completato, le immagini verranno spostate nella cartella di destinazione scelta. E' anche possibile cancellare completamente le immagini senza spostarle. In caso di simulazione, le immagini verranno copiate.
extension.disclaimer: Thumbnails Cleaner works only with Frodo and later
Thumbnails Cleaner funziona solo con Frodo e successivi

extension.summary: Configure and manage VPN connections using openVPN
extension.description: Establish a connection to a VPN provider and automatically switch VPN locations based on the add-on being used. Also supports automatic reconnect and connection at boot time. And with some simple configuring (see README and remote.xml file in add-on directory), you can cycle through VPN connections using a remote button.
